name: Xwing Flight Sim
description:
***THIS IS FRAMEWORK, NOT A FINAL GAME*** 

Xwing flight sim is a downloadable UE project file that enables you to create, design or make your own games, levels and or movies. Just download the project and edit it to your desire. Comes with a playable (movable) xwing, turrets and asteroids. 

More Information can be found on my website - https://danjbrooks99.wixsite.com/danbrooks/copy-of-3d-platformer
